snippet.title: American Dad! Pinball Trailer
snippet.description:
Good morning, USA! Embark on fun-filled adventures with your favorite characters from the hit TV show AMERICAN DAD! Help Stan keep his country safe and his family sane by any means necessary!

American Dad! Pinball hits PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, PlayStation Vita, Xbox One, Xbox 360, Steam, iOS, Android, and Amazon platforms this fall!
